::Grounded/Lynxiz::
In an instant Grounded disabled Trinity's code not allowing her to
walk through the field.
"I'm sorry Trin...can yu come watch the moniters for me."

Lynxiz ran out following Nightlight.
"Sorry but you took me in....I shall fight for you...for now." she
replied running out but getting stopped by the shiled for not having a
code. Grounded noticed this and opend the shields for a split second.
"Get out" the small mole spit out and Lynxiz ran out not waiting the
shileds closing behind her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity/Termitron/Nightlight/Windlord
>
> Windlord go out an fired two missiles against Banzai-bot. Nighlight
> opened her comm link as soon as she knew that the base was attacked
> and said to Grounded "Grounded don't let TRinity go out" and looking
> to Lynzix she said "I have to fight... I can't beg you that jojn this
> battle and I suggest you that stay here"
>
> She ran towards the exit. TErmitron left the ship and fired 25 times
> against Deemos.
>
> Trinity shouted "No body will hurt my friends!!!!!" and ran towards
> the exit
>
>
>
>
